text: I set the gclid from a person visiting from google analytics in a hidden form field. I store it in local storage in the browser then retrieve it when a form with that form field is on the page.

<@U7G631G5P> commented on <@U25C65C3S>â€™s file <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/U25C65C3S/F7TN2P0MT/-.py|https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/U25C65C3S/F7TN2P0MT/-.py>: Cool I used a variation of this!

text: Nice, all my event pages are going to have different URL names for their respected cities. The hidden value I would need is the city name so I pretty much could grab this from the URL and insert it into the hidden value with something similar to what <@U25C65C3S> provided above.
